About Us

Dr. Reena Srivastava

DEAN SCHOOL OF COMPUTER APPLICATIONS - (HEAD LAKSHYA)

Lakshya is the student club run by the students of School of Computer Applications, BBD university invloved in organising and managing of various events in their department such as seminars and talks. Under the guidance DR. Reena Srivastava, team lakshya is commited to help students through different events and providing exposure to the students.
